name: The Neighbour's Peanuts
description:
Help our noble hero steal from the neighbour’s bountiful peanut harvest. They’ve had it good for too long. You could only dream of growing such magnificent crops. Take back what should be yours!

But beware of what lurks between the stalks - Creatures so diabolical, as harmless as they may seem. Don’t even touch em.

Submitted as entry to Ludum Dare 52 (Compo) (Theme: Harvest)

Thanks for playing!
